SELECT a.hymmSeq , a.hymmName , a.hymmId , a.hymmDelNy , b.hysmSeq , b.hyspSeq , b.hymmSeq , b.hysmRoleCd , b.hysmHost , b.hysmDelNy , c.hyspSeq , c.hyspName , c.hyspDelNy
FROM hybdSpaceMember b LEFT JOIN hybdMember a on a.hymmSeq = b.hymmSeq LEFT JOIN hybdSpace c on c.hyspSeq = b.hyspSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND b.hysmAcceptedNy = '1' AND b.hysmExitNy = '0'

SELECT a.hyspSeq , a.hyspName , b.hysmAcceptedNy
FROM hybdSpace a LEFT JOIN hybdSpaceMember b on b.hysmRoleCd = 13 AND b.hyspSeq = a.hyspSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND b.hymmSeq = #{hymmSeq} ORDER BY hysmSeq DESC

SELECT a.hyspName , b.hymmSeq , b.hysmAcceptedNy , c.hymmName
